title: When you see a post complaining your main is OP, cancer, or something like that
body:
And you must defend them at all costs... 

https://rationalmale.files.wordpress.com/2011/09/white-knight.jpeg

replies.body: {{champion:432}} Don't have to worry about people complaining.
That's true, if you hate Bard, there's a 10000000000000000000% chance you're robo-Hitler.

Well shit

http://th06.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2010/066/c/a/Robo_Hitler_by_Phobos_Romulus.jpg

You blew his cover

{{champion:432}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3046}} 
Robo-Hitler is no match for my 100% Crit Meeps.
http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view/51690/oh-my-god-o.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Legacy Hydralpha,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YiY45hI8,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-16T23:21:19.372+0000)
>
> {{champion:432}} Don't have to worry about people complaining.

:Soon:
My Bard skills are so powerful that it makes him OP.

Let them complain!

http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/35600000/-Jack-Sparrow-pirates-of-the-caribbean-35602989-471-319.gif
http://media.tumblr.com/73ccb1bc265b36e4504a6faa91a70851/tumblr_inline_mha8lqk80J1qz4rgp.gif

I don't always hear people complain about {{champion:62}}, but when I do:

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/creepyWukong_zpskatmknxd.png 
Heard you were talking sh*t.
THAT'S FUCKING TERRIFYING? LOOK AT HIS EYES JESUS!!

I main Kassadin and I just laugh when people say he's OP, but I do think his recent buff was unnecessary. It's funny too because the only times in game I hear people complaining about him being broken is when I'm 15/3 and am at full build

I mained him in season 3. Well, in the 10% of the games that he wasn't banned. He was very balanced. Source: his own quotes. 
 "The balance of power must be preserved." he shouted while at 58% winrate for more than an entire season.
Or you just use reason and agree with them... Oh wait, I see what you're doing.
Reason and agree in League of Legends? Has such a thing truly ever occurred? You must tell of this miraculous event, comrade!

{{champion:7}} 
Hey man, it takes a great deal of effort to click on you as hard as I did.
{{champion:37}} Nah, i'll admit she is really strong atm.
Especially in ARAM... 70% winrate :S (for comparison: second highest is 63%)
Wait where do you find aram winrates?
http://www.lolking.net/champions/sona?chartType=winrate&region=na&map=ha&queue=normal#statistics
Yah, shes a teamfight MONSTER. thats her whole thing. and in a situation where she can go full ap and not support AP shes strong as fuck.
{{champion:203}} http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/72/Kindred.taunt01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150916183248

Not very often {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
